content.question: Lines 29-34 (“I thought . . . ends”) suggest that the speaker imitated Miss J— primarily because she

choices.label: felt a need to win Miss J—’s approval
thought Miss J—’s diction was especially beautiful
knew everyone in her community respected Miss J—
regarded speech like Miss J—’s as a means of self-improvement

content.answer: regarded speech like Miss J—’s as a means of self-improvement

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
